text: Arabs skazaly, "My Mu'mens (viruyuchi)." Skazhitʹ, "Vy ne poviryly; shcho vy musyte kazaty, `we Muslims (submitters),' do viry vstanovlyuyetʹsya u vashykh serdenʹkakh." Yakshcho vy pidkoryayetesya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, Vin ne postavytʹ budʹ- yaki vashi pratsi vytratyty. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
